notes_text: If someone is considered an addict by the Syrian government then they face no criminal penalties for drug possession.
notes: If someone is considered an addict by the Syrian government then they face no criminal penalties for drug possession.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Syria}} If someone is considered an addict by the Syrian government then they face no criminal penalties for drug possession.<ref>{{cite news |url=https://raseef22.net/article/1069955-syrians-turn-drugs-forget-burden-war |last=Ali |first=Tareq |title=Syrians Turn to Drugs to Forget the Burden of War |date=18 May 2017 |work=Raseef |access-date=2 August 2022 |archive-date=28 June 2022 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20220628193018/https://raseef22.net/article/1069955-syrians-turn-drugs-forget-burden-war |url-status=live }}</ref>
